title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Survey-based Project for Online Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and understanding of online learning environments
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the importance of 15 essential elements in online course design.
Learners can propose course design plans incorporating core elements such as feedback mechanisms.
Learners can analyze survey results to build an online education platform tailored to learner needs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
